snippet: Countering rumors that he was dead, Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, the Islamic State leader, issued a new call to arms in an audio clip posted online.

byline.original: By DAVID D. KIRKPATRICK and RICK GLADSTONE

lead_paragraph: Countering rumors that he was dead, Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, the Islamic State leader, issued a new call to arms in an audio clip posted online.

headline.main: ISIS Chief Emerges, Urging ‘Volcanoes of Jihad’
headline.print_headline: ISIS Chief Is Said to Emerge, Urging ‘Volcanoes of Jihad’

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
